title: Hour 1 - Tim Legler (06-04-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Tim Legler (06-04-20)
description:
Tim Legler gives his take on what Drew Brees was trying to say. Tim says he likes the format that the NBA finally chose to go with. Tim tells Dan that you have to respect the spot up shooters too.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
